Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> nobody has run wireshark. But i did read every line of code in the app

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <PrivatoshiÂ²> If any other apps are getting anything

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> people can record ciphertext of TLS sessions, that is about it

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> but that is about it. Wormholes now, that is very different

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> wormholes can do bad things if they are evil, but they are an optional convenience

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> another layer is we need to lock down the android app, give it less permissions to do transactions

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> i.e. we need a setting like "only allow android app to send transactions less than X amount" and all that jazz

Author: Gateway#3763

Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> but, I am trying to protect the SD full node wallet from a malicious Android phone with SDA on it

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> we need some kind of PIN feature

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <PrivatoshiÂ²> Can u explain that to me?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> I think about worst cases a lot

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> Such as "what if this metaverse thing can de-anon most privacy coin?" lol

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> What if your phone gets malware, after you install SDA?

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> and that malware says, hey, I can talk to a full node wallet!

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> SD needs to protect itself as best it can

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> the current codebase, SD and SDA trust each other too much. There is no way to say "make this android phone a watch-only wallet" or "only allow this android to spend up to 100 HUSH per day"

Author: Gateway#3763
Content: [dscrd-hush] <dukeleto> the only option is "give full control"
